work.title: Assistant Art Instructor
work.description: Assistant instructors in providing free multimedia arts education to high school students as part of ASC's STUDIO 345 afterschool community youth program.

work.title: Makerspace Program Assistant
work.description: Provided training to patrons and ensured a safe operating environment at APL makerspaces across campus as part of the Be A Maker Program (BeAM). Experience with customer service, customer/employee training, woodworking, digital design, and digital fabrication.

work.title: Residential Computing Consultant
work.description: Provided on-campus residents with one-on-one IT support and maintained networking equipment throughout the residential communities through the ResNET program.

work.title: Senior Residential Computing Consultant
work.description: Managed and led a regional group of ResNET student consultants.

internships.title: Web Developer Intern
internships.description: Maintained websites for the school's various Entrepreneurship Center projects. Responsibilities included injecting custom code and uniform styling across WordPress, Squarespace, and Wix sites.

internships.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
internships.description: Assisted in developing a world-wide university ranking system, along with implementing an experimental video streaming protocol researched here at UNC. With focus in front-end development and RESTful API design.

volunteering.title: Event Volunteer
volunteering.description: Volunteered at An Evening of Believing, a prom night for children battling cancer and other serious conditions.

volunteering.title: Event Volunteer
volunteering.employer: Kids Health Links (KHL) & Health Occupation Students of America (HOSA)
volunteering.description: Volunteered at KHL events providing medical care to children of low-income families free of charge. Also volunteered at various HOSA-sponsored blood drives.

volunteering.title: Volunteer Committee Member
volunteering.description: Provided assistance at various CFTK events such as fundraisers, and maintained the organization's website as a member of the technology committee.

volunteering.title: Technology Volunteer
volunteering.description: Volunteered as part of ResNET to collect, sort, refurbish, and rebuild computers for families with limited access to technology at home.
